I'm sick with some damn flu, everyone. So I'll be slow posting. Sorry.

* D watched as the land approached, wriggling but then becoming still again 
once the island's solid earth was under his feet though his toes had not yet 
touched it.
He wimpered one last time before Fenux landed, moving quickly so that his 
front paws touched the ground before his back. It felt so good!
But this whole place was strange!
He had grown in a star ship, he didn't know what living on a planet was like 
and it was frightening as well as exciting.
D curled into a tight ball as soon as all four linbs were on land, his tail 
curled around hos side and his ears flat against his skull. His nose sniffed 
carefully in every direction, pizzled on what this place was and taking in 
it's smells.*
